***
<div style="text-align:center; margin-top:25px; margin-bottom:25px"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="About Image" /></div>
This project was made for the OCR Computer Science A Level as the final year NEA project, and was built using the MonoGame framework in C#. <br><br>It allows for quick prototypes of games to be created using a simple GUI system and object management system. 

***
<div style="text-align:center; margin-top:25px; margin-bottom:25px"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Prerequisites Image" /></div>

In order to run this project, you must have .NET Framework installed to allow for the MonoGame template files to be properly installed. This can be installed [here](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet-framework).

To avoid any bugs that may occur, it is recommended to run the following commands in a terminal:
```batch
dotnet new install Monogame.Templates.CSharp
```
This will install the necessary MonoGame templates which is used to create and compile games.

***
<div style="text-align:center; margin-top:25px; margin-bottom:25px"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Features Image" /></div>

This project allows for users to create simple prototypes using a GUI. It features:
- Object and Scene Management
- Game Compilation
- Game Execution whilst making changes
- User Input Support
- Player Movement
- Tile-based 2D Maps
- Scene Preview
